All Classes and Interfaces|All Packages

C

calculateFitness() - Method in class population.Chromosome
The calculateFitness() method counts the number of equalities between the data member chromosome string and the TARGET string defined in the Utilities class and returns the count as an integer.
chromosome - Variable in class population.Chromosome
The data member chromosome represents the actual String that represents the Chromosome instance.
Chromosome - Class in population
The Chromosome used in the Genetic Algorithm in this project represents a String created with a collection of genes(characters) taken from ascii (0-126).
Chromosome(String) - Constructor for class population.Chromosome
Parameterized Constructor of Chromosome class taking String as an argument which is assigned to the chromosome data member of the class.
createCrossover(String) - Method in class crossover.CrossoverFactory
 
createMutation(String) - Method in class mutation.MutationFactory
 
createPopulation() - Static method in class main.Utilities
The Static method createPopulation() returns a Population that is an ArrayList of chromosomes, of size 100(value of static variable POPULATION).
createSelection(String) - Method in class selection.SelectionFactory
 
crossover - package crossover
 
crossover(Chromosome) - Method in class population.Chromosome
The crossover() method of the Chromosome class takes another Chromosome as an argument and returns the child Chromosome which is created when crossover occurs between the Chromosome that calls the method and the Chromosome that is passed as argument.
crossover(Chromosome, Chromosome) - Method in interface crossover.Crossover
 
crossover(Chromosome, Chromosome) - Method in class crossover.OnepointCrossover
The crossover() method of the OnepointCrossover takes two objects of Chromosome class as the arguments and returns a new child Chromosome created using these two parent Chromosomes.
crossover(Chromosome, Chromosome) - Method in class crossover.UniformCrossover
The crossover() method of the UniformCrossover takes two objects of Chromosome class as the arguments and returns a new child Chromosome created using these two parent Chromosomes.
Crossover - Interface in crossover
This is an Interface for Crossover operation.
CrossoverFactory - Class in crossover
This a factory class which returns different types of crossovers
CrossoverFactory() - Constructor for class crossover.CrossoverFactory
